channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- CoreShield One-Way Gateway (OWG) Software
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- CoreShield One-Way Gateway (OWG) Software

item.title: CVE-2022-38466|2024-08-03T10:54:03.668Z -- siemens -- coreshield%20one-way%20gateway%20%28owg%29%20software
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in CoreShield One-Way Gateway (OWG) Software (All versions < V2.2). The default installation sets insecure file permissions that could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges to local administrator.
